content.text: Using a GtkSpinButton to get an integer

code: // Provides a function to retrieve an integer value from a GtkSpinButton
// and creates a spin button to model percentage values.

content.text: Using a GtkSpinButton to get a floating point value

code: // Provides a function to retrieve a floating point value from a
// GtkSpinButton, and creates a high precision spin button.
// creates the spinbutton, with three decimal places

for the entry and the two buttons, with these names. The button nodes have
below the text node. The orientation of the spin button is reflected in
the .vertical or .horizontal style class on the main node.
